alert.note: Alert for Atlantic; Cape May; Ocean; Southeastern Burlington; Western Monmouth (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 22 at 2:56PM EST until December 23 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Delaware, Delaware Beaches. In New Jersey, Western Monmouth, Ocean, Atlantic, Cape May and Southeastern Burlington. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 PM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A brief period of wind gusts near 60 mph is possible as a strong cold front races offshore from late morning to early afternoon Friday.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Atlantic; Cape May; Ocean; Southeastern Burlington; Western Monmouth
